name: .LIFE File Extension
summary: Learn about .LIFE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Light Notebook, an application that helps users record, organize and share their lives; saves all notes and files in a user's Light Notebook account; used as a digital time capsule.

content: Light Notebook, Inc. was previously known as Light of Creativity. The software is now discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
